attributes.action: Keep imcompetent drivers off the road.
attributes.additional_details:
The maximum number of driving tests any person can take should be limited to 5.

Anybody who needs more that this may not be capable of safely controling a vehicle and therefore may not make a competent driver. This will help keep people who struggle with driving from gaining a licence and possibly causing an accident.

The number of driving bans should also be limited to 3.

If you have little or no regard for the rules of the road, then you should not be allowed the use the road and endanger other road users at all.
